name: Small Ready for Battle Bow
description: Our Ready for battle line of bows is price strong and fits perfectly in any Larp theme. This bow is small, has light draw strength and is easy to string and pull. name: Medieval Youth Bow
description: Our wood and fiberglass youth bow is perfect for any experienced larp archer. This bow is small, has light draw strength and is easy to string and pull. Our elegant wood bow has stitched suede leather hand grip and because of its length is perfect for forest fights. This bow can be used by children under strict supervision and using our Larp arrows.

name: RFB Horsebow
description: Authentic style Horse Bow inspired from the famed archers of Genghis Khan. This bow is made from shaped fiberglass and has real wood tips with a traditional horse bow nock.
